overview: The movie revolves around Sunny, a fifteen-year-old boy who is obsessed with his teacher, Payal. At school, the sex-crazed headmaster Mr. Gomes flirts with the female teachers and at home, his Casanova father is involved in love games with his secretary Sophia.  Caught between these two, Sunny becomes crazy about sex at his tender age.
tagline: 15 yrs old boy + 26 yrs old girl =
title: Tauba Tauba
